Source.Name: libinput-gestures
Source.Summary: Background application to intercept and action libinput gestures from touchpad
Source.Description: Libinput-gestures is a utility which reads libinput gestures from your touchpad and maps them to gestures you configure in a configuration file. Each gesture can be configured to activate a shell command which is typically an xdotool command to action desktop/window/application keyboard combinations and commands.
